document.title: Hot Topic: Legislature Makes Significant Changes to Drug Fund
document.abstract: The Legislature recently made some significant modifications to state forfeiture laws and the expenditure of drug funds. Among the changes is a requirement that the local governing body approve a budget for the "drug fund." The new changes will become effective July 1, 1997.
